title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a skinny man in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing a thin man in a dream: Thinness in a dream means lack of weight and the body in general suffers from excessive thinness and causes trouble, which is a side effect of losing weight such as weakness, osteoporosis, and so on. A thin man in a dream has many different indicators, as a thin man in a dream indicates poverty, need, problems and suffering in life. If a married woman sees that her thin husband is experiencing financial difficulties, follow us to the next husband. Seeing a thin man by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that seeing a thin man indicates weak faith and disobedience. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his body has become weak in the dream, this indicates Marriage matters are accelerating in reality. Seeing a weak person in a dream is a sign of trouble. A married woman seeing as if her husband has become thin in a dream indicates a material need that the house really needs. Seeing a thin stranger in a married woman’s dream is a sign of Failure or failure to achieve what you want from something. Seeing a thin man with a handsome face in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth. Seeing a thin man for a single woman To see a tall but thin man in a dream for an unmarried woman, means a long life for her. Outlook For an unmarried woman, her fiancé has become a slave in a dream indicates problems in her livelihood. Seeing a wedding with a skinny man in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates problems that she will face in the future. Seeing a skinny, handsome man in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of her good luck. Seeing A fat person in a dream as if he has turned into a thin person is a warning that indicates many problems that he faces physically and morally. Seeing a deceased person in a dream as if he was thin means that he is a person whose friendship was few in this world and shows his need for begging and charity. Seeing a skinny man that I know in a dream is seeing A thin person in a dream indicates the weak financial, moral, and religious status of this person. Whoever sees that he is weak, this is evidence of weak faith and lack of worship. It can also indicate the dreamer’s bad moral and psychological condition. It also indicates stress, pain, and lack of financial resources. Seeing a famous person in Dreaming of a fat and thin man is a sign of the financial crisis that will occur. Seeing a thin man in a dream Seeing a fat person who has become thin in a dream indicates a psychological crisis that the girl will go through. If a married man sees that he is fat and thin, this indicates that he is going through successive difficulties or that they are accumulating on him. Debts. Thinness in a man’s dream may indicate his distance from God and the abundance of sins and desires. If a married woman sees that she is fat and thin, this may indicate that she is exposed to a psychological crisis and many marital problems and quarrels. Seeing a dead mother in a dream who appears thin indicates her need for begging and charity. It is also a sign that the fortuneteller remembers the mother. Seeing a friend in the dream of an unmarried girl who appears thin indicates the problems and crises she is going through, as indicated in the dream of a married woman.

title: Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream

preview.html: The sink is a type of home appliance that we find in all homes. The sink has many uses. It is found in the bathroom and the kitchen, and each one uses it for its own purposes. The sink is very important in the home, and its appearance in a dream has many important interpretations and connotations. Some of them are good and some are bad. The appearance of the pelvis in a man’s dream differs from its appearance in a woman’s dream, its appearance in an unmarried girl’s dream, and also from its appearance in a pregnant woman’s dream. All of these indicators and interpretations will be dealt with in detail and we will learn about them through this article. Interpretation of a dream Isolation in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bathtub in a dream for a single girl. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is bathing in a bathtub, this dream is evidence that she has established a number of new friendships because of her domineering femininity. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream while bathing in a bathtub, This is evidence that she will receive a lot of good. When an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream diving into a basin, this is a sign that she will get married soon. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a basin full of water, this is a sign that she will marry a man known for generosity and who is characterized by feelings. Noble. Interpretation of a dream about a cheater in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees a basin filled with water in her dream, this means that she will give birth to many males and females. The appearance of a basin in a married woman’s dream is evidence that God will grant her good offspring in the event that she does not Their backs are empty. Interpretation of a dream about burning in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a pelvis in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pelvis in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth naturally, easily and smoothly. To see a full pelvis in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will give birth to good offspring and be satisfied with them. Seeing a full pelvis in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will give birth to good offspring and be satisfied with them. A pregnant woman washing in the basin in her dream is evidence that she will give birth safely and that her fetus will be healthy. Interpretation of a dream of a veiled girl in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream for a man. When a man dreams that he is bathing in the bathtub in front of a group of people, this dream is a sign that he will be exposed To scandal. When a man sees himself bathing in a bathtub in an open place, this is a sign that he is committing many sins. When a single man sees an empty bathtub in a dream, this is a sign that he will face some problems. Interpretation of a dream about paper in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a tub in A dream by Ibn Sirin. The appearance of a basin in a dream is evidence of a person’s generosity that benefits those around him. Seeing a basin in a dream filled with a lot of money is evidence that the dreamer will acquire enormous wealth. Whoever sees himself drinking from a basin in a dream indicates that he will eat a lot, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Doors in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. When a person sees in a dream a basin filled with water and performs ablution from it, this is evidence of his closeness to God Almighty. Seeing a person in a dream drinking water from the basin is evidence that he occupies the highest positions at work. Seeing the same person in a dream He is swimming in the pool

When an unmarried girl sees a father hitting her mother, she may This is a sign of love and tenderness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: What is the interpretation of the dream of marrying my unmarried sister in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my unmarried sister getting married: There is nothing closer to the heart than a sister, and her best wish is for her to get married and enjoy a happy home and family. When the dreamer sees in a dream that her unmarried sister is getting married, her feelings are mixed with hers. Joy and desire to know the interpretation and know what the interpretation will return to her. We will explain all of this through this article by presenting the largest number of issues and opinions that concern the leading scholars and interpreters in the world of dreams, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about my unmarried sister’s wedding: Seeing an unmarried sister getting married in a dream carries many connotations and signs that can be recognized as Next: The dreamer who sees in her dream that her unmarried sister is getting married shows her closeness to God and her commitment to the teachings of her religion in a way that pleases God with her. Marrying an unmarried sister in a dream indicates good luck in this world and receiving good opportunities on the practical and social level. If the dreamer sees Dreaming that her unmarried sister will get married, this symbolizes the happiness and prosperity in which she will live in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about my unmarried sister marrying Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin discusses the interpretation of marriage to an unmarried sister in a dream due to its frequent occurrence, and the following are some of the interpretations attributed to it: Ibn Sirin interprets Seeing the dreamer’s unmarried sister getting married in a dream represents a lot of good and abundant money that she will earn in her life. If the dreamer sees that her sister, who has never been married before, is getting married in a dream, this symbolizes positive changes and happy events that await her in her life. A woman’s vision of a marriage Her unmarried sister to a prince in a dream indicates that her situation will be good and her financial situation will improve. Interpretation of a dream about my unmarried sister marrying a single man. The interpretation of a sister’s marriage in a dream varies according to the social status of the dreamer, and the following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol in a dream: The unmarried girl A married woman who sees her sister’s wedding in her dream is evidence of her success and superiority over her peers in studies. If an unmarried woman sees her sister, who has never been married, getting married in a dream, this symbolizes that God will bless her with a good man, great wealth, and she will live a calm and stable life with him. Marriage of a sister An unmarried girl in a dream indicates her freedom from sins and disobedience and God’s acceptance of her repentance and good deeds. Interpretation of a dream about my unmarried sister marrying a married woman. A married woman who sees in her dream that her unmarried sister is marrying is a sign of the stability of her marital life and the rule of an atmosphere of love and intimate relationship in her family environment. If A woman attended her unmarried sister’s wedding in a dream, as this symbolizes the death of her worries and anxieties and the enjoyment of a life free of problems and difficulties. The marriage of the dreamer’s unmarried sister in a dream indicates the achievement of her goals and aspirations that she sought so much. title: Learn about the interpretation of Friday in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Friday in a dreamFriday is the last seven days of the week, and the noon prayer has been imposed and is called Friday, where all the people gather in the mosques, where they find its performance. He wants to know its interpretation, and in this article we talk about what commentators said about this vision. Friday in a dream. Imam Nabulsi, may God have mercy on him, says that dreaming of Friday in a dream is a sign of many good things for the dreamer and he will have the opportunity to travel soon. And when the dreamer sees in a dream that it is Friday Friday, this indicates a happy and stable life and the great joy that he will soon have. If a married woman sees that it is Friday in a dream, this portends a calm and more stable married life. If a person dreams that he is praying on Friday among a group of people in the mosque, this means that he He will get what he wants and achieve all his goals. And if a young man sees that he is praying with people on Friday, this symbolizes the huge benefits and profits that he will receive soon. If the dreamer is disobedient and sees Friday in his dream, this means that he will repent to God and stop the evil that he is doing. And when The dreamer sees that he is praying with people or praying on Friday in a dream, this means that he is close to the Hajj trip. And when the sleeper sees in his dream the Friday sermon in the pulpit, this gives him good news about the great status he will obtain among the people. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Search on Google for a website about the secrets of dream interpretation. It includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Friday in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, says that Friday in a dream shows great kindness and blessings in this world, and the dreamer will be pleased with happy tidings soon. If the dreamer is suffering from many problems And in her dream she saw Friday prayers, this foretells that she will get rid of all the difficulties and obstacles that she faces in those days. And when the dreamer sees that he is completing the Friday prayers in a dream, this means that he will get what he wants, and God will alleviate his distress. And if the dreamer sees that she is performing the Friday prayers, she will It symbolizes the strength of her faith and her commitment to the principles of her religion, and that she will live long. If an unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is performing the Friday prayer, this foretells that the date of his marriage to a beautiful girl is near. But if the dreamer sees that there is a woman leading the man in the Friday prayer, then this is a vision. Unexpected, because it is forbidden. Friday in the dream of single people. Lawyers say that seeing an unmarried woman in a dream on Friday means happiness and abundant living that she will get from us soon. Also, seeing the dreamer on Friday means that he has high morals and good conduct and will achieve everything he dreams of. When a girl who studies on Friday sees you praying for her, this promises her that she will achieve her goals and excel in her studies. If the dreamer sees that on Friday and is happy with it, this means that he is close to an urgent marriage or engagement to a young man with good morals. And if the girl sees that he is praying on Friday, Friday among the crowds and prayed to God, for He would give her great good news and great blessings that she would soon receive. The gathering

And if the dreamer sees that she is performing the Friday prayers, she will It symbolizes the strength of her faith and her commitment to the principles of her religion, and that she will live long. If an unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is performing the Friday prayer, this foretells that the date of his marriage to a beautiful girl is near. But if the dreamer sees that there is a woman leading the man in the Friday prayer, then this is a vision. Unexpected, because it is forbidden. Friday in the dream of single people. Lawyers say that seeing an unmarried woman in a dream on Friday means happiness and abundant living that she will get from us soon. Also, seeing the dreamer on Friday means that he has high morals and good conduct and will achieve everything he dreams of. When a girl who studies on Friday sees you praying for her, this promises her that she will achieve her goals and excel in her studies. If the dreamer sees that on Friday and is happy with it, this means that he is close to an urgent marriage or engagement to a young man with good morals. And if the girl sees that he is praying on Friday, Friday among the crowds and prayed to God, for He would give her great good news and great blessings that she would soon receive. The gathering

title: Interpretation of seeing war in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing war in a dream: War is a battle between two parties, one of whom makes the other wrong, and it may be due to the occupation of the land or because of disputes and enmities, which is the opposite of peace. Interpretation of seeing war in a dream if the vision revolves around a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, and we will present it today through the Vision website. We will move on to the interpretation of seeing war in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, or contemporary interpreters, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing war in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing war between people indicates an increase in prices Goods and commodities. Seeing wars between kings or presidents indicates the spread of illness and disease. Seeing war in a dream indicates the spread of strife. What is the interpretation of seeing war in a dream for a man? Seeing preparations for war in the dream of an unmarried young man is a sign of fulfilling one’s desires in life and hearing good news. Seeing victory in War for a man in a dream indicates achieving what one desires and getting a promotion or obtaining the desired job. If someone sees him fighting, this indicates toil and fatigue in order to get enough money to take care of his family and children. What is the interpretation of seeing war in a single woman’s dream? If an unmarried girl sees herself participating in a war, this may indicate that her wedding is approaching, as it indicates that she heard happy news. If a girl sees a war and does not participate in it, this may indicate failures and hearing news that does not satisfy her. What is the interpretation of seeing war in a dream for a woman? Married? Seeing warplanes in a married woman’s dream is an indication of the dreams and aspirations that she wants to achieve and strive to achieve. If a married woman sees that she is fighting with a sword, it is an indication that he will have offspring and a female. What is the interpretation of seeing war in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees that she participated in the war and won, this indicates To the approaching date of birth, the ease of it, and the health of the newborn. Seeing a duel and war with her husband in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the emergence of serious differences between them. What is the interpretation of seeing war in a dream of a divorced woman or a widow? If a divorced woman or a widow sees that she is fighting in an army, this indicates However, he bears many heavy responsibilities. Seeing projectiles in a dream for a divorced or widowed woman is a sign of her strength of character and resistance to challenges. What is the interpretation of a dream about war and missiles for a single woman? Seeing projectiles in a dream for singles indicates bad talk and a lot of rumors. Seeing a sudden projectile falling in a woman’s dream Unmarried Statement of unexpected disasters and complaints. What is the interpretation of a dream of war and killing? Seeing fighting the enemy and defeating him indicates overcoming obstacles and traps. Seeing war and not participating in a man’s dream indicates severing family ties and mistreatment of the family. What is the interpretation of a dream of war and escaping? Seeing escaping from War: It indicates failure and bad news. Seeing in a dream a young man escaping from war indicates loss of opportunities, failure to obtain an educational qualification, or leaving a job.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a kiss on the head in Ibn Sirin’s dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the dream of seeing a kiss on your head in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? A kiss on your head in a dream indicates that someone can help you do something and the issue is money. If you dream of seeing children kissing this means that the family is happy and satisfied, and the kiss on the head indicates... Supporting and helping a person, and kissing to meet needs, facilitate things, and remove worries and pain, because it indicates that they have gone through difficulty. Stages Follow us in the next stage: Dreaming of seeing the head kissing Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing Hajj in a dream means the need for something. Kissing your head in a dream means that you have taken advantage of a specific person. Seeing children kissing them in their dreams is a sign of family bonding. The interpretation of seeing a mother kissing her hand indicates In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer’s desire can be fulfilled thanks to the mother’s attraction to the dreamer. In general, kissing the mother in a dream represents good news about the dreamer’s success, wealth, and kindness. A kiss on the lips indicates determination to do a certain thing. Seeing a kiss without lust indicates a good omen. Seeing a young man or a single man kissing a beautiful woman indicates his marriage to a wealthy woman and she showers him with her money. Seeing someone kissing a familiar person indicates complying with that person’s orders or taking responsibility and taking care of his public and private affairs. Dreaming of seeing the head kissing a single woman indicates kissing the mother in a palace in her dream. That she is proud to hear the good news. This also explains the interpretation of the dream that a person gets when he dreams of an unmarried woman, and it is a blessing for her marriage. Explain to them that seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is seeing a head kissing her in the dream, which proves that the girl has obeyed her family and did not You disobey God. Seeing a kiss on the neck indicates emotional need, loneliness, and loss. Kissing on the neck can indicate buried longing, longing, urgency, and speed in making a decision. Kissing on the mouth shows lies and falsehoods. Dreaming of seeing a married woman kissing her head. The evidence that interprets the dream of kissing the head in the eyes of a married woman. It proves the justice of a woman. Kissing a married mother in a dream is good news for her about pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about kissing an old man in a dream can prove that she is raising her children. Kissing the head of a dead person in a dream is one of the visions of dream scholars, and it means that kissing the head is submissive and good in morals and religion. Also, a kiss on the head of the deceased indicates that the dreamer has received generous money and livelihood from the family of the deceased. Perhaps it was a joint project that God wants to bring him happiness and success. Seeing the deceased and kissing him in a dream can reflect the strength of emotion and intense thinking about his affairs, and the dreamer should To tell the truth and pray for him. You dream of seeing the head kissed on a divorced woman. Kisses show the need for romantic feelings and love. Expressing contentment in person. A kiss on the cheek indicates hearing the good news and the disappearance of problems and sadness. Accepting the plaintiff with the corresponding evidence. Dreaming of seeing him kissing the head of a pregnant woman. If you see a person Beautiful woman accepts childbirth, it means that childbirth is becoming easier and easier. If you see an ugly person

title: Interpretation of seeing a wedding for a married woman in a dream

preview.html: Marrying a married woman in a dream is one of the things that may interest many people because of its strangeness and knowing what a married woman’s vision indicates about her marriage again in different situations, especially in the case of seeing a white dress. Marrying a married woman in a dream Marriage is one of the sacred and special issues in our lives, which Lovers coming together and seeing that in a dream has always had good connotations over time and according to the interpretations of many interpreters, but if a woman is married and sees her marriage locking up her husband again, this indicates affection and compassion between them and the degree of understanding they have in their relationship. While a woman who sees In her dream that she is marrying someone who is not her real husband, this symbolizes the fulfillment of a desire that she has long desired and pursued with all her heart. Whoever sees this should be hopeful and praise the Lord. (Glory be to Him, the Most High) for answering her prayers. Marriage of a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of a woman who marries someone other than her husband, saying that she will attain great honor in it, and she will acquire many distinguished and prestigious values, and she will have authority over many people because of the important positions that she will occupy. It is occupied in the country. While a married woman who sees in her dream that she is marrying her dead husband, this symbolizes the revival of her memory and the absence of him in her life, apart from obtaining money and multiple benefits from a place she did not expect. Not at all, but he will benefit from it a lot. Interpretation of a dream about Asrar is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Marrying a married woman in a dream with Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi confirmed that seeing a married woman getting married in The dream symbolizes that she is assuming many responsibilities that will place more burdens on her and tasks that require more effort and time, which she had not thought about at all. Meanwhile, for a woman who is going through difficult health conditions, if she dreams of getting married again, but she does not recognize the person who married her, this indicates Although she will die soon, she has a lot to do. Doing good deeds and submitting the matter to the Lord (Glory be to Him) for He is the Most Merciful to her and He is the Most High who knows. Marrying a pregnant woman in a dream. If a pregnant, married woman dreams that she will marry her current partner, this symbolizes that she will be able to give birth to a good son with her and his father, because of great love and tenderness. Between them, compassion and understanding. With her is the one who gives water to their children, thus preserving a blessing for them in their days of need. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is marrying someone other than her current husband without the marriage being apparent, this symbolizes that she will give birth to a very beautiful and calm girl who will not care at all about her upbringing or correcting her. Rather, it is help, happiness, and a source of comfort in her life. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a woman married to a strange man. A woman who sees in her dream that she is marrying a strange man, her vision indicates that she will fall into a big problem that she did not expect or expect that it will affect her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing twins in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see the birth of twins in a dream, the genetic factor plays a role in the birth of twins, as you find that the family in which there are twins increases the likelihood of having twins in the second generation, injection and trumpet. There is a high probability of giving birth to twins, due to the injection of many eggs at the same time to ensure the success of the operation, but what are the indications? Interpretation of a dream about seeing the birth of twins in a dream for a married, single or divorced woman, as well as the implications of this vision for a man. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the birth of twins in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing twins in a dream has two faces, one of which heralds goodness, calm and psychological comfort in the dreamer's life, and the other indicates bad luck and worries that affect the dreamer's life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing twins in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing twins in a dream indicates psychological comfort, as well as peace of mind, peace of mind and calm. It can be a sign of more anxiety and stumbling in the dreamer's life, especially if it is in the patient's dream. In addition, if a person sees a twin with a different shape, the vision indicates an increase in responsibilities and anxiety on the shoulders of the visionary. While playing with twins in a dream, it shows the goodness and fun that comes to the dreamer's house. But the crying of twins in a dream is a sign of obstacles and problems in the dreamer's life. On the other hand, seeing tired twins in a dream indicates sadness and sorrow. See Also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing money taken from an unknown person in a dreamInterpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married womanSeeing twins in a dream has many different interpretations, but in most visions it is good news and happiness that the dreamer will enjoy. What came in the interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees twins in her dream, this is a sign of the wonderful and beautiful life that she will live. He will also be able to achieve dreams. In addition to seeing the birth of twins of boys or males in a married woman's dream. It indicates the outbreak of disputes with her husband and she will have a date with many problems and problems in her life. And when a married woman sees herself pregnant and giving birth in a dream, this is a sign of the exacerbation of problems and crises in her life. During childbirth in a dream, it indicates a short rest and the loss of sorrows and worries. Also, a married woman dreams that she gave birth to twins and they were playing together. This is good news for her about the stability of life and the emergence of happiness and joy in her life. But seeing male twins arguing and not playing together indicates the crises and problems that the dreamer will face. It can change her life and her situation to The worst. See also the interpretation of a dream about a spider in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. The interpretation of the birth of twins in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing the birth of twins in a dream for a single woman is a harbinger of creating money and wealth in the near future, but if a single woman who works in a company sees twins in her dream: This indicates the peak of her work. Perhaps the vision was a sign of a promotion in

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a person repeatedly in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a human being in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing the repetition of a person in a dream leads to the strength of the bond and emotion that dominates that person. Also, seeing a person constantly in a dream indicates the person’s need for someone to see and his strong subconscious attachment to him. Likewise, if The person never appeared in the dream in our lives, this indicates deception of the opinion of a family member or one of his friends. Seeing someone in a dream more than once If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she sees someone constantly, this indicates that she is married to this person and that she is thinking about him A lot in reality. Likewise, seeing an unknown person repeatedly in a dream indicates instability, poor living, and deception by many in her dream. Also, repeatedly seeing a relative in a dream leads to many of the problems and fears that the girl sees in her dream, and God knows best. Likewise, seeing someone hitting her severely until her feet swell, this indicates the sins and immorality she is committing and her disobedience to God. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone repeatedly in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream because she has met someone several times, this indicates that she is cheating on her husband because of Before one of his friends. Likewise, seeing a stranger repeating a married woman in a dream and making herself available to her, this vision indicates false actions that he performs. Also, seeing someone in a dream constantly indicates that this person needs her and also indicates that she will get pregnant soon With a male child. Interpretation of the dream of seeing someone in a dream with a pregnant woman: Seeing a stranger chasing her all the time and seeing him more than once indicates the evil that will happen to her. Also, seeing someone constantly recurring in a dream indicates the ease of his birth and the birth of a healthy child from all diseases. Seeing her friends in a dream directly indicates that her friends cheated on her, and her husband cheated on one of her friends. Interpretation of a dream that a person sees repeatedly in a dream about a man. If a man dreams that he sees his wife all the time in his sleep, this indicates his intense love for her and that he does not leave her. Also Constantly seeing a specific person in a dream means that he will join a new job and do good work. Also, seeing an unknown person in a dream indicates the death of one of his close friends and the illness that will afflict the dreamer. Repeating seeing an unknown person in a dream. The continuous repetition of a person in a woman’s dream and she cannot bear it, as this It indicates deception that she will see in her life from the people closest to her. Also, if an unmarried girl sees in her dream her old lover whom she hates, this indicates her marriage to him and a lot of money and food. Seeing a stranger in a dream is one of the visions that indicate some difficult issues. Which the dreamer suffers from. Repeating a dream about a specific person without thinking about him. Repeating a dream about people is one of the visions that indicate the negative thoughts that haunt the dreamer in his life and the bitter reality in which he lives. It is also one of the dreams that have meaning for the psychological state resulting from some problems

The continuous repetition of a person in a woman’s dream and she cannot bear it, as this It indicates deception that she will see in her life from the people closest to her. Also, if an unmarried girl sees in her dream her old lover whom she hates, this indicates her marriage to him and a lot of money and food. Seeing a stranger in a dream is one of the visions that indicate some difficult issues. Which the dreamer suffers from. Repeating a dream about a specific person without thinking about him. Repeating a dream about people is one of the visions that indicate the negative thoughts that haunt the dreamer in his life and the bitter reality in which he lives. It is also one of the dreams that have meaning for the psychological state resulting from some problems
